description: This table holds information about prior authorization for medications in certain workflows. It is currently only used when communicating with eClaimLink for authorizations.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: MED_AUTH_RESULT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the medication authorization result.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Denied

columns.name: MED_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Holds the authorization ID returned by the payer.

columns.name: AUTH_DENY_RSN_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: AUTH_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the instant the authorization is valid from.

columns.name: AUTH_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the instant the authorization is valid to.
